summary: Diff updates backend/frontend code and rollout documentation (notably App.tsx router-level error handling and a Rollout 21.7 smoke test checklist doc), but does not include evidence of executing the canister upgrade, running the smoke test end-to-end, or recording smoke test results in the required results file. It also introduces additional rollout-step content for 21.1–21.2 that was not requested for Rollout 21.7.

missing_requirements.requirement: Produce the next build and deploy it via a canister upgrade for Rollout 21.7, keeping all existing canister state intact, and ensure the build/deploy pipeline completes successfully (no “Unable to create your app” failure).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code/doc changes but no evidence of build artifacts, deployment pipeline configuration/output, or any explicit canister-upgrade/state-preservation work/results. From the diff alone, the build+upgrade completion and state preservation cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: After the Rollout 21.7 canister upgrade, execute the post-upgrade smoke test checklist in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md` using both an admin user and a non-admin approved member user.
missing_requirements.reason: While the checklist file exists/was modified, there is no evidence in the diff that the checklist was executed end-to-end post-upgrade for both roles (no recorded outcomes/logs/results).

missing_requirements.requirement: Record the Rollout 21.7 smoke test outcomes in `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` under the “Rollout 21.7 Smoke Test Results” section.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` is not shown as modified in the diff summary, so the required results section completion (environment fields, principals, pass/fail, failure notes) is missing from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded rollout documentation content for “Step 9.1 — Rollout 21.1–21.2 Build/Upgrade Readiness” (including creating/mentioning a 21.1–21.2 smoke test and related documentation updates), which is outside the requested Rollout 21.7 execution + smoke test + results recording scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is specifically about executing Rollout 21.7 upgrade and post-upgrade smoke test + recording results; introducing a separate 21.1–21.2 readiness step is not requested.
